Name: *open
Doc: If True, the dialog is visible. If False, it is hidden.

Name: on_action
Doc:
Name of a function that is triggered when a button is pressed. The parameters of that function are all optional:
  • state instance
  • id
  • action
  • payload
    • args: List where the first element contains the index of the selected label.

Name: close_label
Doc: The tooltip of the top right close icon button. In the _on_action_ function, args will hold -1.

Name: labels
Doc: A list of labels to show in a row of buttons at the bottom of the dialog. The index of the button in the list is reported as args in the _on_action_ function (-1 for the close icon).

Name: width
Doc:
The width, in CSS units, of this dialog.
(CSS property)

Name: height
Doc:
The height, in CSS units, of this dialog.
(CSS property)
